name: Enforce Documentation-First Workflow
description: Blocks direct code modifications and reminds developers to update documentation first

then.prompt:
⚠️ DOCUMENTATION-FIRST WORKFLOW REMINDER:

Before modifying code, ensure you have:

1. ✅ Updated requirements.md with user stories and acceptance criteria
2. ✅ Updated design.md with architecture decisions and diagrams
3. ✅ Updated tasks.md with task breakdown and estimates
4. ✅ Updated CHANGELOG.md with the change description
5. ✅ Run alignment check: python scripts/check_doc_alignment.py .kiro/specs/{feature}

Have you completed all documentation updates? If not, please update docs first before proceeding with code changes.

See .kiro/steering/doc-first-workflow.md for complete guidelines.
